com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.colour
Class ByteRGBA

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.colour.ByteRGBA

public class ByteRGBA
extends java.lang.Object

Class to represent red-green-blue colours stored with 8-bit resolution. Note the various methods in this class of the form opXXXXX are translations of the original C++ operator overloads.

Version:
$Id: ByteRGBA.java,v 1.5 2006/07/06 06:59:43 martin Exp $
Author:
martin
